医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新研究支持对心脏病患者采取更自由的输血方法罗格斯大学健康中心主导的一项研究表明，心脏病发作后为贫血患者提供更多血液可能会挽救生命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/New-research-supports-more-liberal-blood-transfusion-approach-for-heart-attack-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/New-research-supports-more-liberal-blood-transfusion-approach-for-heart-attack-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=080d92cc-ba6a-423c-aeea-1c4bae600c63 Mon, 23 Dec 2024 23:59:26 -0500 New research supports more liberal blood transfusion approach for heart attack patients
SPLICER 在阿尔茨海默病和其他疾病中显示出希望伊利诺伊大学厄巴纳-香槟分校的研究人员报告称，一种新的基因编辑工具可以帮助细胞机器跳过导致疾病的基因部分，该工具已被应用于减少阿尔茨海默病小鼠模型中淀粉样蛋白斑块前体的形成。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/SPLICER-shows-promise-in-Alzheimers-and-other-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/SPLICER-shows-promise-in-Alzheimers-and-other-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be4ca315-f398-43b3-aa26-bb4e98c1bd2e Mon, 23 Dec 2024 23:46:04 -0500 SPLICER shows promise in Alzheimer's and other diseases
新的 MRI 方法可以通过分析心脏脂肪来预测心脏病风险每个人都知道腰部和臀部携带过多脂肪的健康风险，但 UVA Health 的科学家正在开发一种无创方法来评估心脏周围看不见的脂肪的健康风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/New-MRI-method-may-predict-heart-disease-risk-by-analyzing-heart-fat.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/New-MRI-method-may-predict-heart-disease-risk-by-analyzing-heart-fat.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c98dc6f4-f2a2-4acd-8783-d27d912e0339 Mon, 23 Dec 2024 23:32:10 -0500 New MRI method may predict heart disease risk by analyzing heart fat
抗 TNF 药物被证明可预防克罗恩病肛周瘘用抗肿瘤坏死因子药物早期治疗儿童克罗恩病可以大大降低肛周瘘管的风险，肛周瘘是克罗恩病的一种特别令人衰弱的并发症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/Anti-TNF-drugs-proven-to-prevent-perianal-fistulas-in-Crohns-Disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/Anti-TNF-drugs-proven-to-prevent-perianal-fistulas-in-Crohns-Disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3ff5111-6749-4b6a-86e8-c19b3e29b6e6 Mon, 23 Dec 2024 23:19:31 -0500 Anti-TNF drugs proven to prevent perianal fistulas in Crohn's Disease
新年保护大脑健康的十二要素在新的一年里改善您的大脑健康可以从一个简单的步骤开始，与您的神经科医生或初级保健医生讨论保护大脑的 12 个因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/Twelve-factors-to-protect-brain-health-in-the-New-Year.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/Twelve-factors-to-protect-brain-health-in-the-New-Year.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3fae0b20-c440-4b5f-89eb-ceec8c83ecf3 Mon, 23 Dec 2024 23:10:47 -0500 Twelve factors to protect brain health in the New Year
随着流感担忧的加剧，RSV 疫苗的接受度有所提高根据安纳伯格公共政策中心 (APPC) 2024 年 11 月进行的一项新的健康调查，在上市一年后，用于预防新生儿和老年人感染 RSV 的疫苗正被美国公众更广泛地接受。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/RSV-vaccine-acceptance-grows-amid-rising-flu-concerns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/RSV-vaccine-acceptance-grows-amid-rising-flu-concerns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea562ae2-0059-462a-97b7-67034b79c8a2 Mon, 23 Dec 2024 23:09:09 -0500 RSV vaccine acceptance grows amidst rising flu concerns
新型偏头痛药物 atogepant 可快速缓解偏头痛根据美国神经病学学会医学杂志《神经病学》在线期刊 2024 年 12 月 23 日发表的一项研究，最近批准用于预防偏头痛的药物可能会立即开始发挥作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/New-migraine-drug-atogepant-shows-quick-relief.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/New-migraine-drug-atogepant-shows-quick-relief.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e96e7920-3b40-4773-b7ce-624f5f895a6b Mon, 23 Dec 2024 23:05:55 -0500 New migraine drug atogepant shows quick relief
COVID-19 感染与 MS 症状恶化或残疾无关根据美国科学院医学杂志《Neurology》2024 年 12 月 23 日在线期刊上发表的一项研究，对于多发性硬化症 (MS) 患者，感染 COVID-19 与 MS 症状或残疾恶化无关。神经病学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/COVID-19-infection-not-linked-with-worsening-MS-symptoms-or-disability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/COVID-19-infection-not-linked-with-worsening-MS-symptoms-or-disability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8290587d-3d7f-4077-87d8-ac1bc57d2f26 Mon, 23 Dec 2024 23:00:51 -0500 COVID-19 infection not associated with worsening MS symptoms or disability
与 Optimer 签订新合同，开发 RNA 治疗生物分析工具Aptamer Group plc 是新型 Optimer® 粘合剂的开发商，旨在促进生命科学行业的创新，今天宣布与一家罕见疾病生物制药公司签署了一份新的开发合同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/New-Optimer-contract-to-develop-bioanalytical-tools-for-RNA-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/New-Optimer-contract-to-develop-bioanalytical-tools-for-RNA-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8dd9f185-374f-42fd-80a7-b28b3e7defe6 Mon, 23 Dec 2024 22:52:00 -0500 New Optimer contract to develop bioanalytical tools for RNA therapy
研究人员确定了大脑压力与阿尔茨海默病之间的关键机制纽约市立大学研究生中心高级科学研究中心 (CUNY ASRC) 的研究人员揭示了一种将大脑细胞压力与阿尔茨海默病 (AD) 进展联系起来的关键机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/Researchers-identify-key-mechanism-linking-brain-stress-to-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/Researchers-identify-key-mechanism-linking-brain-stress-to-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf3edf54-f9b5-418a-83cb-ed5898f2c46c Mon, 23 Dec 2024 21:15:00 -0500 Researchers identify key mechanism linking brain stress to Alzheimer's disease
